dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: GOD IS THE SUN / DIVINE REVELATION IS LIGHT

kernfrasen: bear the cost of our sin
dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: SIN IS DEBT / SALVATION IS REDEMPTION

kernfrasen: put your roots down into Christ

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: The sun isn’t so much something you see as much as it’s the way you see everything else.

cognitieve_implicaties: Human reason is not autonomous; it is dependent on a 'light' source.
theologische_implicaties: God is the precondition for all knowledge, not just religious knowledge.
ethische_implicaties: Intellectual humility; one's ability to 'see' truth is a gift.
onbedoelde_consequenties: If God is the only light, those 'in the dark' are cognitively incapable of any truth.

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: The preacher revitalizes the dead metaphor 'God is light' by explaining the physics of how light enables vision without being the object of vision.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The preacher uses a 'Trilogy of Light' (Life, Truth, Beauty) as a cognitive bridge to link the abstract concept of God to the concrete experiences of biology, optics, and aesthetics.

incoherentie_punten.conflict_beschrijving: The shift from the impersonal/physical domain of light to the highly personal/legal domain of the kinsman redeemer.
incoherentie_punten.entailment_conflict: Light is a natural force; a kinsman is a legal/familial agent. One acts by nature, the other by choice/covenant.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: The preacher blends these by describing the Cross as the 'Light of the World being plunged into cosmic darkness' to pay a 'debt'.

sterktes.beschrijving: Re-activating the source domain of 'Light' through the lens of seasonal depression and physics.
sterktes.voorbeeld: People who live there have trouble with depression... We need light for joy.

risicos.beschrijving: The heavy use of 'debt' and 'payment' language can reinforce a transactional view of God.
risicos.voorbeeld: Pay the debt we couldn’t pay.
risicos.potentiele_impact: Congregation may view grace as a bank transfer rather than a relational reconciliation.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: A world of shifting light—from the dark Northern Hemisphere winter to the dawning sun of Isaiah's vision.
sub_worlds: The POW camp (Bridge on the River Kwai)

deictic_shifts.locatie: The Bridge on the River Kwai illustration
deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: Highly effective for inducing 'Schema Disruption' regarding self-righteousness.

verstoorde_schemas.verstoring_strategie: Contrasting mechanical growth (bricks) with organic growth (trees).

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Strongly aligned with the Epiphany season (January/Light).

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by the 'GOD IS LIGHT' conceptual metaphor, which is masterfully unpacked into three sub-mappings: Life, Truth, and Beauty. This provides a robust cognitive framework that carries the hearer from the physical world to the internal psychological world and finally to the theological/historical work of Christ.

revitalisatie_suggesties.huidige_status: Risk of being a 'dead' or purely technical term.
revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Deepen the 'Kinsman' aspect to emphasize the 'Blood Relative' source domain.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: Describe the social shame of the kinsman entering the slave market to claim a relative.

coherentie_verbeteringen.incoherentie: The transition from God as 'Being itself' (impersonal) to 'Father' (personal).
coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Use the 'Light' metaphor to bridge this: Light is both a wave/particle (physical) and that which allows us to see faces (personal).

entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: If sin is only a debt, once paid, the relationship is neutral but not necessarily intimate.
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Balance with the 'Relational' domain (Marriage/Adoption) to ensure the goal is union, not just a zero balance.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To expand on the 'City of the Lord' and 'rebuilding walls' mentioned in the text.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterful example of cognitive homiletics that uses a single dominant metaphor to organize complex systematic theology.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: While an aesthetic analysis would praise the 'beauty' of the light imagery, CMT reveals how the light imagery functions as a cognitive tool for understanding epistemology (Truth) and regeneration (Life).
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Unlike Kolb's learning cycles, this analysis focuses on the underlying conceptual mappings that make the 'feeling' or 'thinking' possible.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: CMT identifies that the preacher is not just using 'light' as a symbol, but is using the logic of optics to explain the doctrine of Total Depravity (the need for a more 'brilliant light' to see smudges).

volledige_metafoor_lijst: Divine Light come into a dark world
In him we live and move
In thy light we see light
Light of God has dawned on your soul
Pencil lead smudges on the soul
Drunk up the wine of God’s wrath
appendices.notities: The sermon relies heavily on the 'Light' schema to maintain unity across disparate biblical texts (Isaiah, John, Romans).
